title: Velicha Poove Lyrics Ethir Neechal Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Velicha Poove
Singers: Mohit Chauhan, Shreya Ghosal
Movie: Ethir Neechal
Music: Anirudh
Lyrics: Vaali		 .Other Songs Lyrics
1. Boomi Enna Suthudhe
2. Velicha Poove
3. Ethir Neechal
4. Un Parvayil
5. Nijamellam
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
Oh oh minvettu naalil ingae
minsaaram poley vandhaaye
va va en velicha poovey vaa

Uyir theetum uyiley vaa
kulir neekum veyiley vaa
azhaithaen vaa anbae

Mazhai megam varum podhu
mayil thogai viriyaadho
azhaithaen vaa anbae

Kadhal kadhal oru joram
kaalam yaavum adhu varum
aadhaam yevaal thodangiya kalai
thodaikadhai adangiyadhillaye (2)

Oh oh..
Japanil vizhithu eppodhu nadandhaai
kai kaalgal mulaitha haikoovey

Oh javvaadhu mandhai unmeedhu
thelikkum haikoovum unakkor kai poovey

Vizhagaamal thodum vilaakal naaldhorum
piriyadhavannam puraakkal thozhserum

eechal poove thodu thodu
koocham yaavum vidu vidu
yekkam thaakum iravai
oru irvai thavirpadhu thagumaa

Oh oh minvettu naalil ingae
minsaaram poley vandhaaye
va va en velicha poovey vaa (2)

Uyir theetum uyiley vaa
kulir neekum veyiley vaa
azhaithaen vaa anbae

Mazhai megam varum podhu
mayil thogai viriyaadho
azhaithaen vaa anbae

Kadhal kadhal oru joram
kaalam yaavum adhu varum
aadhaam yevaal thodangiya kalai
thodaikadhai adangiyadhillaye (2)

 English Translation
I tried my best :)
on a power cut day,
you came as power,
come come my bright flower.

a will that strikes soul,come.
a sunlight that removes cold, come.
I called you, come my love.

When rainy cloud comes,
don't peacock spread out her feathers?
I called you, come my love.

Love is a fever,
it comes in all seasons,
Adhaam Yevaal started a story,
a story that never ends.

oh oh
when you started walking in Japan,
like a poem with hands and legs.

oh, a poem which sprinkles fragrance mind
on you is also a hand flower for you.

a daily festival to touch without .
birds join together without separating.

touch me eechal flower
leave all your shyness
is it worth to leave this night
with desire

come come my bright flower.

a will that strikes soul,come.
a sunlight that removes cold, come.

a story that never ends.
